text: Adim (English: The Instinct) is a 2022 Bangladeshi crowd funded narrative feature film. It was released on August 30, 2022. The film is directed by Juboraj Shamim. Mohammad Nuruzzaman is the executive producer of the film. Amir Hamza is the Cinematographer of this Film. It has won two awards; the Silver Saint George (Special Jury Award) and the Netpack Jury Award at the 44th Moscow International Film Festival. It was featured in the Religion Today Filmfestival, held in Italy. It's also been a selected feature in the 2022 Queens World Film Festival, which is held in New York. == References == Category:2022 movies Category:Bangladeshi movies
title: Adim
